newest.message:
# Release v3.0.2
## Bug Fixes - More fixes around Market Transactions and Contracts with Citadels - Fix a bug in Auto-Updater
### Contributors - Blitz Bandis - Jimi C

release.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Minimum .NET Framework version required is 4.6.1.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Ashilta * CCP Bartender * OperatorOverload * DefectiveNu
== New Features ==
* Unfortunately, no new features are provided in this release.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug where queries relating to Citadels would cause EVEMon to crash
== Enhancements ==
* EVEMon has been brought up-to-date with the latest version of the EVE SDE. * Implemented time syncrhonisation using NTP rather than NIST DAYTIME. * Implemented a framework by which calls to the ESI API can be facilitated moving forwards * Scaffolded a framework for character management to facilitate queries to the ESI API * Implemented a Server Status lookup using the ESI API
== Misc ==
* None
